pullRequest.body:
This instance was defined using the fact that `FiniteDimensional` is equivalent to `IsNoetherian`, but we can also use `Module.Finite`. Together with previous proof cleanups,. we can even save some imports. (Which will be even better once I get around to rearranging the results we have on `FiniteDimensional`.)

Note that the two instances are indeed defeq.

---

- [ ] depends on: #22589
